attributes.action: We ask Her Majesty's Government to declare Pakistan a state sponsor of Terrorism
attributes.additional_details:
Trail of investigations into the 9/11 terrorist attacks in New York by US authorities led to Pakistan. Many of those terrorists were found to be 'trained' by terror networks in Pakistan.
Trail of investigations into the 7/7 terrorist attacks in London by British authorities also led to Pakistan. Atleast 3 of 4 terrorists had travelled to Pakistan before the attacks. 
Investigations into the 26/11 terrorist attacks in Mumbai & many other attacks on Indian soil also point finger to Pakistan.
attributes.background: Pakistan continues to double speak on issue of terrorism. It has aided & abetted enemies of the international coalition (of which Britain is a leading partner with the US) against terrorism. Osama Bin Laden's hide out was in Pakistan. Pakistan continues to harbour UN sanctioned terror networks.

rejection.details:
“State Sponsors of Terrorism” is a designation used by the Department of State in the United States of America. This designation is not used in this way by the UK Government.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to take a specific action to address your concerns about Pakistan.
